statements: DELETE FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won > 5 AND playoff_appearances < 3;
DELETE FROM playoff_history WHERE playoff_season = 2020 AND result = 'Champion';
DELETE FROM playoff_history WHERE playoff_season = 2020 AND team_name = 'LA Lakers';
DELETE FROM RunnerUpFinishes WHERE team_name = 'Manchester United';
DELETE FROM playoff_stats WHERE team_id = 2 AND playoff_round = 1;
DELETE FROM playoff_appearances WHERE team_id = 1 AND year = 2019;
DELETE FROM championships WHERE year < 2010 AND team_id IN (SELECT id FROM teams WHERE playoff_appearances > 5);
